title: Mathematical genius Nischal Narayanam becomes youngest CA at 19
text:
Other Articles BBPOS Unveils Best-in-Class Chipper 2X Scheduled for Q3 2015 Debut Insurance company valuations remain an enigma, reveals CII-Towers Watson study IT Minister of Telangana, K T Rama Rao, to launch Techwave Consulting Inc's Global Delivery Center at an investment of USD 5 mn Nischal Narayanam, a renowned mathematical genius, is now the youngest ever to clear the Chartered Accountant (CA) examination at the age of 19.
Although Narayanam has cleared one of the toughest exams in the country, he will have to wait for two more years to sign the balance sheets as the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) doesn’t enrol members less than 21 year.
Nischal Narayanam has exhibited enormous talent as a child and has been winning several laurels from a very young age.
He is also the world’s youngest mentor of a company at the age of 15 – ‘Nischal’s Smart Learning Solutions Pvt. Ltd’- through which he has designed and developed a Mathematics Laboratory that is adopted by hundreds of schools in the state.
Nishchal is also known as the youngest ‘Double Guinness World Record holder’ in the category of memory.
“If we can have a biology lab or a chemistry lab then why can’t we have a maths lab? I wanted to make maths more practical and easy for people who have maths phobia,” Nishchal said.
 31, 2015 12:54 pm
